content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why the destructive scale of European warfare increased in the twentieth century?

choices.label: European states could now draw on colonial empires for resources.
European states began to implement mass mobilization of conscript armies.
European states deployed new weapons and manufacturing technologies.
European states were influenced by Marxist and communist ideologies.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
